verbs.description: [ARG1: The goal of President Donald Trump 's trade fights] [V: is] [ARG2: to reduce the US trade deficit , which makes the president 's recent focus on Canada and Mexico even more puzzling] .
The goal of President Donald Trump 's trade fights is to [V: reduce] [ARG1: the US trade deficit] , which makes the president 's recent focus on Canada and Mexico even more puzzling .
The goal of President Donald Trump 's trade fights is to reduce the US trade deficit , [ARG0: which] [V: makes] [ARG1: the president 's recent focus on Canada and Mexico even more puzzling] .
